mapper.insert: insert into personDB (PersonName, Account, TravelName) values (#{PersonName}, #{Account}, #{TravelName})
mapper.select: select PersonName from personDB where TravelName = #{TravelName}
select * from personDB where Person_id = #{Person_id} AND TravelName = #{TravelName}
select PersonName, Difference from personDB where TravelName = #{TravelName} AND Role = 'GETTER'

select PersonName, from personDB where TravelName = #{TravelName} AND Role = 'LEADER'
